Desc.eng: Look, who is here! A little birdy told me that you found some moonstones in the wilderness.
Does this birdy have a creepy mask on his face?
Um, well, actually yes. It was Prisoner Seven.
See, Van Helsing!? Your friend is always listening, always watching, always interfering! It's suspicious.
Katarina, please. Knowledge and secrets are his trade. He told us this much the first time. Yes, we found moonstone. Why?
These moonstones are crystalized tears of the mythical entity called Koschei the Deathless! Shattered, of course. But I could make them whole again! YES! YES! â€¦ Uhm. Only if you want it, of course.
Of course I want it! Do it, please.
